# attributedTitle

**Instance Property**

A custom string for a menu item.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var attributedTitle: NSAttributedString? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The attributed string is not archived in the old nib format.

## Managing the title

- **title**: The menu item’s title.
